    • Method Detail

      • toggleFlag

        public static void toggleFlag(MinAR.FLAG flag)
        Toggle the given flag i.e, deactivate the flag if activated, activate the flag if deactivated.
        Parameters:
        flag - the flag to be toggled.

      • outputArchive

        public static void outputArchive(java.lang.String directory,
                                 java.lang.String archive_file)
        Create an archive of the directory specified output it to the file.
        Parameters:
        directory - the directory whose contents are to be archived
        archive_file - the path of the file. No flags are mandatory for this operation. But, MinAR.FLAG.COMPRESSED and MinAR.FLAG.ENCRYPTED are recommended.

      • isFlagged

        public static boolean isFlagged(MinAR.FLAG flag)
        Checks whether the given flag is activated or not.
        Parameters:
        flag - the flag to be checked
        Returns:
        whether the flag is activated or not

      • toggleFlags

        public static void toggleFlags(MinAR.FLAG... flags)
        Toggle multiple flags
        Parameters:
        flags - the flags to be toggled

      • extractArchive

        public static void extractArchive(java.lang.String archive,
                                  java.lang.String directory,
                                  java.lang.String key)
        Extract the archive into the specified directory. No flags are mandatory for this operation, but if encrypted is selected, then, either MinAR.FLAG.KEY_IS_FILE or MinAR.FLAG.KEY_IS_STRING must be set(toggled on).
        Parameters:
        archive - the archive to be extracted
        directory - the directory to contain the extracted contents
        key - this argument depends on the flag set,
        MinAR.FLAG to be set Parameter description
        MinAR.FLAG.KEY_IS_FILE The path to the .key file generated along with the archive
        MinAR.FLAG.KEY_IS_STRING The string form the key
